algorithm_technique: Spiral traversal of a matrix, filling with linked list values
problem_summary_simple: Fill an m x n matrix with values from a linked list in a spiral order, using -1 for empty cells.
problem_summary_technical: Performs a spiral traversal, filling a 2D matrix with linked list values and -1 for unvisited cells.
key_insights: The problem combines matrix traversal with linked list consumption.
A common approach is to simulate the spiral movement, similar to Spiral Matrix II.
Handle the case where the linked list runs out of elements before the matrix is full.
